desc: Hello,I'm looking for a 3D animation production team with lots of experience. This is a long-term project for over a year.For me, guaranteeing quality assurance and delivery date is very important. Do not bid if you have no experience.3D animations involving nursery rhymesBelow are some more details of what I am looking for:- I am looking to create videos with children’s nursery rhymes in 3d.here is an example of current videos that I like and would like you to produce content similar to that.Dave and ava: Feel free to youtube all their videos to get more ideas about background and character building.Our goal is to get inspiration and create work that will be original and not use someone else’s work.Please be as original as possible but produce quality work.the project will have to be unique with our own characters and designs.Copyright should not be infringed.I need to sign the NDA.[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]please look at the videos below for the two different channels and they have an opening introduction every time with every video. We also would like to have you get inspiration from these two videos and create an introduction to be used in the beginning of all our animations.[url removed, login to view](00:00-00:30)[url removed, login to view](00:00-00:20)If you are capable of surpassing the video the quality referenced (Dave and Ava) than please tell about how much is to create videos that similar content.Please send me the 3d cartoon(URL)you produced earlier.This is a very big project and you need to test your skills.1. Final video file format : *.mp4Final video format will be the high-resolution file that I will be able to use for Youtube and any other streaming website, want it to be compatible with Android, Windows and Mac Devices.Video format will be both mobile videos and nonmobile such as television.Lastly, i want to be able to use this animation later on for an Application.2. Video Resolution : 1920 * 1080 (16:9)3. Number of video frames: 30 frame/second4. Delivery date :in the Start, 4-6 Weeks is perfectly fine with.In the future, we will speed up because we will have all characters made so in the future the goal will be 3-4 weeks.5. Start project date: The project will probably begin in late November.6. Total number of videos to produce: I will be to make at least 30-40 videos7. I will provide you a song.I am looking forward to hearing from you and if there are any details that you may still be required to help understand my needs and how we can work together on this project.Feel free to contact meThanks,

desc: Project Details..1.	 Video Editing Needed.  We need about a 45 second clip put together of just outdoor activities going on.  Some Text & High Quality After Effects needed.  This video needs to look extremely professional, as it will likely be used as a recruiting tool.  We would like a few 2.5 D moving images included as well but not absolutely necessary.  We will supply the footage here, however we will not be able to cut down file size as we do not completely understand After Effects.  We are looking for a long term partner who understands After Effect / Premiere that we can give projects to instead of saying no to our clients.  If the video is high quality it will definitely result in more work.2.	Photoshop Project.   We need a larger sized 24 inch x 36 inch Info Graphic for a class that is coming up soon.  This project will likely be a kayaking class that will be offered very soon.  We will not be able to supply the images on this, so you will have to retrieve the images yourself on this part (from Google or Bing).  Of course we cannot use any copyrighted images on this infographic.  We will show a layout that we are looking for as far as the final result.  This will require a large amount of background removal for photos, and we are hoping to have some small lighting effects as well.3.	We need a background removed from 1 additional photo with a text overlay on the top of the picture.We are hoping to find a long term partner that we can send our video editing requests to.  Currently we are getting requests to edit video, however we are a Web Design Agency & have been unable to help with these requests from our clients.   Please let us know if you have any questions we can help with.  Thank you.

([url removed, login to view]) using an animation similar to ([url removed, login to view])3) Selecting an airport creates a named marker. ([url removed, login to view])e.g. New York - Los Angeles. It should show a marker for all airports (Airport Marker), the selected airports (Selected Airport Marker) and a line connecting destinations (Flight Path). (Please see [url removed, login to view])You should be able to change airports, either depart or arrive, and the globe should update.The page should use standard Bootstrap CSS and Html for styling.Nice To Have but not Essential4) Animate [url removed, login to view] to fly between selected airports. 1 way repeat for single journey. Back and forth between the two destinations.5) Extra points if lighting matches time of day and can be set using a DateTime. (Lighting could be similar to this example [url removed, login to view])We are seeking a great visual here. You must be able to demonstrate some artistic flair using the technologies we have outlined.Please contact me with any questions.Here some files relating to my first attempts and examples to get you started.[url removed, login to view] has a list of ALL airports with lon lat. Please see GlobeTest for usage, must filer by country and airport type. Must be US and of type Airport ( not seaport etc).The initial GlobeTest that we created and it was built with - [url removed, login to view] ([url removed, login to view])We like the initial zoom on this one. Viewpoint example - [url removed, login to view]Examples with markers + trails = [url removed, login to view]([url removed, login to view]) please see [url removed, login to view] to see which features we want from  this globe.[url removed, login to view] = [url removed, login to view] with alterted colours.([url removed, login to view])
